analysis.key_quote: To remove long held civil service protections from federal employees by designating them “at-will” workers in the new category “Schedule Policy/Career” will, I fear, create morale busting conditions for hard working federal employees.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the removal of civil service protections, the potential for politicization of performance evaluations, and the negative impact on employee morale and stability within government agencies.
